Player History
Released by Philadelphia on 4/1/1965...
Drafted in 4th round, 73rd overall pick, by St. Louis in 1968...
Earned first career win on 4/3/1972...
Had first career hit on 4/7/1972, off Jerry Stephenson (PIT)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1972, going 15-16, 4.40 ERA...
Injured on 9/7/1976 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1979, going 6-1, 3.22...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1980, going 5-1, 2.17...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Won Cy Young Award in 1980, going 26-11, 3.51 ERA...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/11/1982 to a 1-year deal worth $5,250,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/20/1983 to a 1-year deal worth $5,250,000 per year...
Released by Texas on 2/21/1983...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 6/23/1983 to a 1-year deal worth $840,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/3/1984 to a 1-year deal worth $2,222,222 per year...
Injured on 5/18/1984 with a Strained Tricep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Drafted in 5th round, 91st overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1987...
Injured on 5/16/1988 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/18/1988 with a Stiff Elbow, out for one week...
Injured on 4/11/1989 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Released by Pittsburgh on 6/16/1993...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 3/1/1994 to a minor league contract.
Earned first career win on 6/10/1995...
Released by Texas on 10/8/1996...
